sentences.sContent: His two main rivals suffer the disadvantage of having been long-term political exiles.
sentences.sCn: 他的两名主要竞争对手由于长期被政治流放而处于不利地位。

remMethod.val: dis (否定) + advantage (优点) → 没有优点 → 不利

words.tran: 贫困的；处于不利地位的；社会地位低下的
使处于不利地位（disadvantage的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tranCn: 不便， 不利， 不利的情况；  损害， 损失
trans.tranOther: A disadvantage is a factor which makes someone or something less useful, acceptable, or successful than other people or things
